Multiplies how much mass a pawn can carry. This is Carrying Capacity in vanilla and Weight in Combat Extended.
LanguageData.EnhancedCarryingCapacity.MassOffset.Tool: Increases how much mass a pawn can carry in addition to the modified original value. This is Carrying Capacity in vanilla and Weight in Combat Extended.
Multiplies how much bulk a pawn can carry, only in Combat Extended.
LanguageData.EnhancedCarryingCapacity.BulkOffset.Tool: Increases how much bulk a pawn can carry in addition to the modified original value, only in Combat Extended.
